INFO.name: link
INFO.description: Link your Project Sekai account to Robo Nene!

subcommands.name: request
subcommands.description: Request a code to link your Project Sekai user ID to your Discord Account.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the Project Sekai account you are trying to link.

subcommands.name: authenticate
subcommands.description: Confirm that the token is placed into your Project Sekai profile description.

DISCORD_LINKED_ERR.message: Your Discord account is already linked to a Project Sekai account.

SEKAI_LINKED_ERR.message: That Project Sekai account is already linked to another Discord account.

BAD_ID_ERR.message: You have provided an invalid ID.

BAD_ACC_ERR.message:
There was an issue in finding this account. Please request a new link code. 
Make sure all the digits are typed correctly.

BAD_CODE_ERR.message:
Invalid code on Project Sekai profile. 
Did you remember to press back on your profile to save the changes?

NO_CODE_ERR.message: Please request a link code first.
